DOC.brief_title: Functional Outcomes HRQoL Upper-extremity Sarcoma Patients After Limb Salvage
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study assess functional capability health-related quality life ( HRQoL ) upper-extremity sarcoma patient undergone limb salvage surgery . Patient hospital record retrospectively review demographic clinical data . The patient recruitment take place outpatient clinic Comprehensive Cancer Center , Helsinki University Hospital , Tampere University Hospital . The study include cross-sectional assessment six month follow-up five validated questionnaire . A follow-up conducted two five year surgery outpatient clinic .
